items.sentence: If I were you, I'd do the same thing Tom is doing.
I don't know whether that's what Tom wants or not.
Tom said that he thought that John was Mary's son.
I don't think that Tom knows Mary is a vegetarian.
I don't think that Tom knows why Mary left Boston.
I don't think Tom knows that Mary is a vegetarian.
I don't think that Tom knows that Mary is unhappy.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was worried.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was excited.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary was nervous.
